examples.example: 后天我们将去郊外愉快地踏青，享受大自然的美好。

translate.english: The day after tomorrow we will go to the suburbs to enjoy a pleasant outing and enjoy the beauty of nature.

examples.example: 后天的天空一定会更加湛蓝，充满希望。

translate.english: The sky of the day after tomorrow will definitely be more blue and full of hope.

examples.example: 后天早晨我打算早起去锻炼身体，迎接美好的一天。

translate.english: The morning after tomorrow I plan to get up early to exercise and welcome a beautiful day.
